Dimming Blow.name: Dimming Blow
Dimming Blow.flavor: To the senses of the one you strike, gloom covers you.
Dimming Blow.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Dimming Blow.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you become invisible to the target until the end of your next turn.

Blackfire Wind.name: Blackfire Wind
Blackfire Wind.flavor: Shadowy blazes engulf your foes and dim your image as you strike true.
Blackfire Wind.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Blackfire Wind.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).
Blackfire Wind.effect: You are invisible to the targets until the end of your next turn.

Devil's Sight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil's Sight.flavor: You tap your heritage and gain a piercing vision.
Devil's Sight.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain darkvision and the ability to perceive invisible creatures and objects as if they were visible.
